title: Vinod Jaiswal takes over as CGM at SBI Bengaluru circle
description: Vinod Jaiswal has assumed the role of Chief General Manager at the State Bank of India, Bengaluru circle, overseeing operations in Karnataka with over 1700 branches and offices and a balance sheet size of Rs 4,50,000 crore. Joining the bank as a probationary officer in 1991, Jaiswal has held various key positions, including DGM in Kolkata circle, GM in Chennai circle, and Chief General Manager in Chandigarh circle.
